response.original_title: Sold As The Alpha King’s Breeder
response.overview: Rosalie thinks her father sold her to the ruthless future Alpha King Ethan as a maid, but she's actually there to be his breeder. Though she falls for him, she learns he plans to kill her after childbirth. Heartbroken, she escapes with Madalynn’s help, faking her death. Ethan realizes too late she's his mate and searches for her. Rosalie starts a new life, but Ethan finds her, saves her from danger, and slowly earns back her love.
response.title: Sold As The Alpha King’s Breeder
